Rainy_Day_0: Hello Tesoro, how about you and me relax today, hm? It's far too wet outside to be going anywhere, no?...$3
Rainy_Day_1: Gorgeous, why not stay in? You'll get wet and we can't be having that, can we topolino?$3^Gorgeous, why not stay in? You'll get wet and we can't be having that, can we topolina?$3
Rainy_Day_2: Mia caro, you look beautiful even in the soaking wet of the rain.$3^Mia cara, you look beautiful even in the soaking wet of the rain.$3
Rainy_Day_3: Mm, my love, look what I found laying about. [90 88 86 535]#$e#I thought you might like to use it!$1
Rainy_Day_4: How'd you sleep, dolcezza, this rain makes me so tired...$3
patio_Copia: **Copia stops writing and his eyes gleam as you approach* Topolino! I love you^Copia stops writing and his eyes gleam as you approach* Topolina! I love you
Rainy_Day_Copia: Hello Tesoro, how about you and me relax today, hm? It's far too wet outside to be going anywhere, no?...$3
Rainy_Night_0: My love, how was your day? I beat my highscore of Driving Miss Daisy - Again!$1
Rainy_Night_1: I can't quite believe I'm living this life with you, @. Mia caro, you are all I ever want.$4^I can't quite believe I'm living this life with you, @. Mia cara, you are all I ever want.$4
Rainy_Night_2: Tesoro, I made you some pizza while here alone! I hope you like it, my love.[206]$h
Rainy_Night_3: Mmm. We should get some wine in, don't you think?$3
Rainy_Night_4: Here, tesoro, some wine for all your hard work. [348] You've earnt it.$1
Rainy_Night_5: How could I ever miss the Ministry when I have nights like this with you, topolino?$3^How could I ever miss the Ministry when I have nights like this with you, topolino?$3
Rainy_Night_Copia: My love, how was your day? I beat my highscore of Driving Miss Daisy - Again!$1
Indoor_Day_0: I made pancakes, my love, just how you like them! Eheh.[211]
Indoor_Day_1: Little mouse, I truly adore you. Do you know that?$3
Indoor_Day_2: I've made your bed for you, and, I've made sure to put your favourite book underneath your pillow, my love.
Indoor_Day_3: What plans do you have mia caro? Or shall it be taking the day as it comes, so to speak, sì?^What plans do you have mia cara? Or shall it be taking the day as it comes, so to speak, sì?
Indoor_Day_4: I wish I could help with your farm work, tesoro, I just simply do not know what I am doing...$0
Indoor_Day_Copia: I made pancakes, my love, just how you like them! Eheh.[211]
Indoor_Night_0: Tesoro you seem so tired, how about I give you a massage before bed, sì?
Indoor_Night_1: My day? It wasn't too bad, no. I did miss you though, my love.
Indoor_Night_2: Are you ready for bed, mia caro? It's all ready for you.^Are you ready for bed, mia cara? It's all ready for you.
Indoor_Night_3: Now is the time for relaxing, topolino, let's wash all those stresses of the day away, mm?^Now is the time for relaxing, topolina, let's wash all those stresses of the day away, mm?
Indoor_Night_4: You gorgeous man, it's time for some rest, okay?^You gorgeous woman, it's time for some rest, okay?
Indoor_Night_Copia: Tesoro you seem so tired, how about I give you a massage before bed, sì?
Outdoor_0: It's truly beautiful out here, tesoro, just like you.$3
Outdoor_1: I'd never miss being stuck in a stuffy Ministry office when I can experience what the world is like out here, you make it infinitely more radiant - topolino.^I'd never miss being stuck in a stuffy Ministry office when I can experience what the world is like out here, you make it infinitely more radiant - topolina.
Outdoor_2: You truly are magnificent, my love. The dark lord truly blessed me with you.$1
Outdoor_3: Hello, @! I wish I knew some more about farming, I would love to help out but- Eh- I wouldn't wish to get in your way.
Outdoor_4: I apologise I cannot help more, I shall admire your beauty from here, tesoro.
Outdoor_Copia: It's truly beautiful out here, tesoro, just like you.$3
funLeave_Copia: I'm just going to head out for a little while, alright? I love you, @!
funReturn_Copia: Phew, I'm so glad to be home to my topolino.^Phew, I'm so glad to be home to my topolina.
OneKid_0: Don't worry, I'm here for our little one. You go and get on with your day, my love!
OneKid_1: I'm so thankful for you and our little one, tesoro, I couldn't imagine my life without you now.
OneKid_3: I love being a father, I don't think Mo- Sister Imperator would quite believe it.
TwoKids_0: The little ones are fed, their diapers changed and they're happy! I hope you have the best day, my love, I'll look after these little terrors while you're gone.
TwoKids_2: These little ones have the best time playing together, they're going to grow up so close -  I just know it.
TwoKids_3: I'm so thankful for you and our little ones, tesoro, I couldn't imagine my life without you now.
Good_1: Topolino! So good to see you, as always.^Topolina! So good to see you, as always.
Good_2: You know, my love, there is truly something special between us. I thank Satanas every day for our meeting.
Good_3: Don't be afraid to take some time to yourself if you need it, my love.
Good_4: How are you doing, tesoro? Your health is so important to me, do let me know if there's anything wrong.
Good_5: Mia caro I am truly, truly stunned - You look so gorgeous today.^Mia cara I am truly, truly stunned - You look so gorgeous today.
